price: Aravuga ati “Ahubwo byakozwe n’iki (kigirwamana) kinini muri byo! Ngaho nimubibaze niba bishobora kuvuga!”
arabic: قَالَ بَلۡ فَعَلَهُۥ كَبِيرُهُمۡ هَٰذَا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُمۡ إِن كَانُواْ يَنطِقُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla bal faʿalahu kabīruhum hādhā fasalūhum in kānū yanṭiqūna
